text: V pokušení is a 1939 Czechoslovak romance film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Jiří Dohnal, Ladislav Boháč and Marie Glázrová. ==References== ==External links== *V pokušení at the Internet Movie Database Category:1939 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Czechoslovak romance films Category:1930s romance films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czech films Category:Czech romantic films Category:Czechoslovak black-and-white films
title: V pokušení
